mapping.to: <template path="templates/java/ValueObject.vsl" outputPattern="{0}/${className}.java" outlet="value-objects" overwrite="true" outputCondition="$stringUtils.isBlank($class.findTaggedValue('algoTrader_value_object_private'))"> <modelElements variable="class"> <modelElement> <type name="org.andromda.metafacades.uml.ValueObject"/> </modelElement> </modelElements> </template> <template path="templates/java/ValueObject.vsl" outputPattern="{0}/${className}.java" outlet="private-value-objects" overwrite="true" outputCondition="$stringUtils.isNotBlank($class.findTaggedValue('algoTrader_value_object_private'))"> <modelElements variable="class"> <modelElement> <type name="org.andromda.metafacades.uml.ValueObject"/> </modelElement> </modelElements> </template>

mapping.from: <propertyGroup name="Outlets"> <documentation> Defines the locations to which output is generated. </documentation>
mapping.to: <propertyGroup name="Outlets"> <documentation> Defines the locations to which output is generated. </documentation> <property name="private-value-objects" required="false"/>
